record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1912. Fifth row: N. B. Johnson (trainer), J. Vruwink, H. O. Page, H. E. Whiteside, P. R. Des Jardien, A. A. Stagg (coach), and C. P. Freeman; fourth row: E. D. Huntington, S. Sellers, H. L. Harris, A. G. Scanlon, and K. G. Coutchie; third row: H. C. Fitzpatrick, S. R. Pierce, W. L. Kennedy, and L. W. Gray; second row: J. B. Canning, H. M. Carpenter (captain), and N. H. Norgren; first row: W. M. Smith, J. B. Lawler, N. C. Paine, and M. L. Skinner.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
